```{=html}
<iframe id="map-iframe" src="urbanform/index.html" class="urbanform-iframe"></iframe>
<script>
(function() {
  function positionIframe() {
    // Try multiple selectors to find navbar
    var navbar = document.getElementById('quarto-header')
              || document.querySelector('.navbar')
              || document.querySelector('nav.navbar')
              || document.querySelector('header');
    var iframe = document.getElementById('map-iframe');

    if (iframe) {
      var navbarHeight = navbar ? navbar.offsetHeight : 0;

      // Fallback: if navbar height is 0 or not found, use reasonable default
      if (navbarHeight === 0) {
        navbarHeight = 56;
      }

      iframe.style.position = 'fixed';
      iframe.style.top = navbarHeight + 'px';
      iframe.style.left = '0';
      iframe.style.right = '0';
      iframe.style.bottom = '0';
      iframe.style.width = '100%';
      iframe.style.height = 'calc(100vh - ' + navbarHeight + 'px)';
      iframe.style.height = 'calc(100dvh - ' + navbarHeight + 'px)'; // Dynamic viewport for mobile
      iframe.style.border = 'none';
      iframe.style.margin = '0';
      iframe.style.padding = '0';

      // Also fix body overflow
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }
  }

  // Run multiple times to catch different load states
  positionIframe();

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', positionIframe);
  window.addEventListener('load', positionIframe);
  window.addEventListener('resize', positionIframe);

  // Extra check after short delay for mobile
  setTimeout(positionIframe, 100);
  setTimeout(positionIframe, 500);
})();
</script>
```
